import Component from './component.mdx';
import Nested from './nested.mdx';
import NestedComponent from './nested-component.mdx';

# Main

<ForEach arr={props.arr}>
  <NestedComponent />
</ForEach>

<ForEach arr={props.arr}>
  <Component name={item} />
</ForEach>

<ForEach arr={props.arr} as="outerItem">
  <Nested>
    <ForEach arr={props.arr} as="innerItem">
      <Component name={innerItem.num} />
    </ForEach>
  </Nested>
</ForEach>

<ForEach arr={props.arr} as="outerItem">
  ### Outer Loop {outerItem}
  <ForEach arr={props.arr} as="innerItem">
    * Inner Loop: {innerItem}
  </ForEach>
</ForEach>
